title: "Research & Publications"

My research focus lies at the intersection of **Agricultural Statistics**, **Spatial Machine Learning**, and **Agrometeorology**. I am particularly interested in how statistical modeling and computational tools can optimize decision-making in the Amazon and other complex agricultural landscapes.
